alert.note: Alert for Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 3:57AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Washington, northeastern Pitt, Martin and northwestern Beaufort Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 357 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bethel, or 11 miles southeast of Tarboro, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Williamston, Plymouth, Bethel, Stokes, Robersonville, Bruce, Hinson, Westover, Pleasant Grove, Cape Colony, Mackeys, Roper, Gold Point, Jamesville, Smithwick, Parmele, Everetts, Dardens and Falkland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
